content: CD 4-22 Cordless caulking dispenser Powerful battery-powered caulking dispenser for a wide variety of sealants, caulks and adhesives (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Dispensers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Minimize waste – variable speed and anti-drip function help you get the most out of every cartridge or foil pack Safer jobsites – you can eliminate virtually all related hand and wrist fatigue by switching from manual to battery-powered cordless caulking dispensers Improved ergonomics – carefully balanced dispenser with LED light for better comfort and precision when working in tight spaces On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, time-saving accessories and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Ultimate versatility – variable pressing force for use with 20 oz barrels and 10 oz cartridges of Hilti or other brand caulks, adhesives or sealants (including high-viscosity products) Applications Dispensing acrylic sealants and adhesives Dispensing firestop, smoke and acoustic sealants Dispensing expansion joint sealants Sealing around pipe penetrations Filling expansion joints or repairing cracks in concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Expel force: 1101.56 lbf No load speed: 1 - 10 mm/s Length (with 310 ml/10 oz barrel): 17.99 in Technical Data | Expel force | 1101.56 lbf | No load speed | 1 - 10 mm/s | Length (with 310 ml/10 oz barrel) | 17.99 in | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 7.3 x 5.7 x 9.7 in | Length (with 600 ml/20 oz barrel) | 22.72 in ### ITEMS- 3778711 - CD 4-22 w/ 20 oz barrel - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CD 4-22 Cordl. dispenser - 1x Barrel CD 4 long assembly set - 3778710 - CD 4-22 w/ 10 oz cartridge - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CD 4-22 Cordl. dispenser - 1x Cartridge CD 4 short assembly set - 2250119 - Cordless dispenser CD 4-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CD 4-22 Cordl. dispenser
